The Complete Influencer Marketing Software Solution

Influencer Analytics is an all-in-one influencer marketing platform that lets you manage your entire influencer marketing campaign cycle in one place. Itâ€™s the perfect combination of features & tools for preparing, running, and evaluating a creator campaign.

All the essentials, nothing useless.

Competitor Intelligence

  • Evaluate competitorsâ€™ ad campaign budgets
  • Perform market and trends analysis
  • Discover the social media influencers leading brands work with on a sponsored or free basis
  • Learn about the preferred dates and time of promotion
  • Discover videos promoting or mentioning a particular app, game, or website

Influencer Search & Discovery

  • 30+ data breakdowns and smart search filters
  • Influencersâ€™ profiles with the most up-to-date data
  • Search for influencers and content creators according to your specific needs, and group them in lists

Reporting & Analysis

  • Get reports on your advertising campaigns automatically
  • Visualize data and performance metrics in organized charts and tables
  • Compare the campaignâ€™s result to your KPIs
  • Get data-based performance forecasts for your marketing strategies
  • Save time with automated calculations

Campaign Management

  • Create a media plan for your campaign
  • Manage team and data access
  • Track and analyze influencersâ€™ content and performance
  • Get a detailed campaign report

Letâ€™s make influencer marketing an accessible and effective user acquisition channel for you. When managing influencer campaigns is made this easy, your marketing team can bring in better results with less effort. Get the all-in-one software ecosystem to automate most of the tasks and make the world talk about your brand.
